sentences.english: According to the research results, some sustainable developmental countermeasures are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 根據研究結果，對方山縣現狀及今後的發展提出建議。

sentences.english: When we eat out, we generally go to the Grand Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 當我們正在外用餐時，通常都去方山大飯店。

sentences.english: While getting down to the bottom, we by the way visited the Fang Shan Yard Waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 下山到山腳時，我們順便遊玩了方山大院農家樂瀑布。
